title: Who said, “The best is yet to come”? - Quora

response.answer_text: FRANK SINATRA: THE BEST IS YET TO COME The final song from Sinatra's final concert, Palm Springs, 1995. The Best Is Yet to Come1959 song composed by Cy Coleman, lyrics written by Carolyn Leigh. It is generally associated with Frank Sinatra, who recorded it on his 1964 album.
